text: Hi <@U01GW2U4WMA> yes I did. But they are still not being shown in the actual quotes :cry:
Did you try deleting the quote and starting fresh?

I have never done it the way you are trying - what I mean is I have never gone into the line_items_table module and added options there.  I  that screenshot you are just adding new columns - not options
Forget the quote for a moment - if you go to a deal and just edit line items (or add new ones) do you see your changes there?
